comments: Great Instructor. Thought that a metallurgy would be boring. Mr. Farmer made it very interesting. I actually looked forward to going to class.
The BEST instructor I have ever had. Very enthusiastic which made coming to class fun. Wish he taught more classes.

I found Professor Farmer to be extreamly passionate about the subject matter he presented in this class. He was unusually enthusiastic and utilized 100% of the time allocated for each class. He was particularly proficient at translating the subject matierial into "real world" usefulness. I learned more than I had hoped to in his class.
great teacher awesome guy got more out of the class then the class you rock bruce said the guy in the back on mushrooms

Great professor probably one of the best i have ever had! i highly recommend taking a class with him. he is very helpful and presents the materiel in a way that everyone can understand. i found myself looking forward to his class every week!!
the most helpful teacher i had ever have.

Great Instructor. Really knows how to teach math while making it fun. Math is not my best class and I never thought I would say that a math class was fun but it sort of was. Bruce has a way of making math seem easy. He never gets mad even when some students ask really dumb questions. If you are not good in math, take this class from him.

Very good instructor. Extremely knowledgeable and likes to answer questions from students. I thought this was going to be a boring class after looking at the textbook but Bruce made it a fun class. Explained many things that were not very well covered by the book or not covered at all.
